actions.message: Looks like another unfortunate person bit the dust and joined us in hell-sad but lets celebrate! Welcome, ${tempVars("member")}, to the Brimstone Bites diner-and no, I wont be serving you. Go read the rules and make yourself useful in the kitchen by making a character.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Whoops! Looks like ${tempVars("member")} couldnt handle the heat. Oh well, another body to chuck into the incinerator. Who wants the dead dude's stuff?
actions.name: Send Message
